metadata.title: CVE-2021-47321 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:watchdog: Fix possible use-after-free by calling del_timer_sync() Thisdriver's remove path calls del_timer(). However, that function does notwait until the timer handler finishes. This means that the timer handlermay still be running after the driver's remove function has finished, whichwould result in a use-after-free. Fix by calling del_timer_sync(), whichmakes sure the timer handler has finished, and unable to re-scheduleitself.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
